mewa pawathinne dewiyan wahanse siyalla sanshodhanaya karana thuru pamana ya. 11 eheth kristhun wahanse danata ma athi yahapath de pilibanda uththama pujakayanan washayen pamini wita, un wahanse wada uthum ha wada sampurna, minis athin nosadu, enam, me bhauthika mawillata ayithi nowana mandapaya madin wadiya seka. 12 un wahanse eluwangeth, wassangeth leyin nowa, thamange ma leyin apa udesa sadathana wimukthiya laba sadahata ma eka warak shuddhasthanayata athulu wu seka. 13 manda, wathpiliweth anuwa apawithra yayi salakana aya matha eluwangeth, gonungeth le da, ela wassiyakage alu da isimen, owhu parishuddhiya labannahu ya. 14 ese nam, jiwamana dewiyan wahanseta sewaya karana pinisa obage hrudaya sakshiya nishpala kriyawalin pirisidu karanu labima, sadathana aathmayanan mangin thaman ma kalalak nathi wa dewiyan wahanseta puja wu, kristhun wahansege le karanakotagena, eetath itha wadiyen pirisidu nowanne da? 15 me karanaya nisa, kandawanu labuwanta sadathana urumaye poronduwa labena pinisa un wahanse aluth giwisumaka madahath karayano wana seka.

rajagiriya, kalapaluwawa pradeshaye padinchi wiwahaka yuwalak, wahana wikinime muwawen karana lada mudal wancha rasak pilibandawa adala pudgalayan walikada polisiyata paminili kara atha.irida puwathpathwala pala karana lada danwimak matha paminena ayata wahanayak penwa, prathamayen aththikaram mudalak laba ganna bawath, pasuwa manga harimin sitina bawath, polisiyata labi athi paminiliwala sandahan we.me anuwa polisiya mangin sakakara yuwalata wiruddhawa nadu pawara athath sakakariya polisiya mangaharimin sitiyi.athadanguwata gath sakakaru aluthkade adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen pasu apa pita nidahas kara atha.me wanawita withthikaruta wiruddhawa nadu 5k adhikaranaye wibhagawemin pawathi.wahanaya miladi ganimata ena aya idiriye mema sakakaru saha sakakariya akka saha malli men rangapana bawada polisiyata labi athi paminiliwala dakwe.samahara awasthawala mema pudgalaya waidyawarayaku lesa peni sitimin katayuthu karana bawada polisiya kiyayi..
